languages.text: На костяной табличке под древней реликвией изящной вязью вырезана надпись: "Если жизнь тебе дороже долга, ее ты не стоишь. Висирь Джеофранус".
Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."
languages.original_text: На костяной табличке под древней реликвией изящной вязью вырезана надпись: "Если жизнь тебе дороже долга, ее ты не стоишь. Висирь Джеофранус".

traits.locale_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved into it in elegant cursive, "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."
Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved into it in elegant cursive, "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

languages.text: Unter dem uralten Relikt befindet sich eine Steintafel mit einer Inschrift in eleganter Schreibschrift: "Wem das Leben wichtiger ist als die Pflicht, der ist des Lebens nicht würdig. Wesir Geophranus."
languages.original_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

traits.locale_text: Unter dem uralten Relikt befindet sich eine Steintafel mit einer Inschrift in eleganter Schreibschrift: "Wem das Leben wichtiger ist als die Pflicht, der ist des Lebens nicht würdig. Wesir Geophranus."

languages.text: Bajo la antigua reliquia hay una placa de piedra con una inscripción grabada en cursiva elegante: «Si valoras la vida por encima del deber, no eres digno de vivir. Visir Geophranus».
languages.original_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

traits.locale_text: Bajo la antigua reliquia hay una placa de piedra con una inscripción grabada en cursiva elegante: «Si valoras la vida por encima del deber, no eres digno de vivir. Visir Geophranus».

languages.text: 古代の聖遺物の下には、優美な筆記体で「義務よりも命を重んじるのであれば、生きるに値しない。ヴィジール・ゲオフラヌス」と刻まれた石板がある。
languages.original_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

traits.locale_text: 古代の聖遺物の下には、優美な筆記体で「義務よりも命を重んじるのであれば、生きるに値しない。ヴィジール・ゲオフラヌス」と刻まれた石板がある。

languages.text: 这件古老的圣物下面有一块石碑，上面用优雅的草书刻着这样的字迹：“珍视生命甚于珍视职责之人，不配享有生命。——宿老杰法拉乌斯”
languages.original_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

traits.locale_text: 这件古老的圣物下面有一块石碑，上面用优雅的草书刻着这样的字迹：“珍视生命甚于珍视职责之人，不配享有生命。——宿老杰法拉乌斯”

languages.text: Aux pieds de l'antique relique, une plaque de pierre porte l'inscription suivante, rédigée dans une élégante écriture cursive : « Qui attache plus d'importance à la vie qu'à son devoir ne mérite pas de vivre. Vizir Géophranus »
languages.original_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."

traits.locale_text: Aux pieds de l'antique relique, une plaque de pierre porte l'inscription suivante, rédigée dans une élégante écriture cursive : « Qui attache plus d'importance à la vie qu'à son devoir ne mérite pas de vivre. Vizir Géophranus »

languages.text: Kadim yadigârın altında taş bir levha bulunuyor. Üzerine zarif bir el yazısıyla bir yazı kazınmış: "Eğer ki yaşama vazifeden daha çok kıymet biçiyorsan bu yaşama layık değilsin. Vezir Geophranus."
languages.original_text: Underneath the ancient relic is a stone plaque with an inscription carved in elegant cursive: "If you value life above duty, you are not worthy of life. Vizsier Geophranus."
